SEARCH

modality 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT API

Modules
Module
Description
modality.all.backoffice.application
The Modality Back-Office application (cross-platform non-executable module).
modality.all.frontoffice.application
The Modality Front-Office application (cross-platform non-executable module).
modality.base.backoffice.activities.filters
The back-office Filters activity to create, modify, delete filters (displayed in other activities).
modality.base.backoffice.activities.home
The back-office Home page that displays activities as browsable tiles (only the authorized ones are displayed).
modality.base.backoffice.activities.operations
The back-office Operations activity.
modality.base.backoffice.masterslave
Some class materials to build master/slaves views, with optionally an additional group view.
modality.base.backoffice.operations.filters
Defines the basic operations that a back-office user can execute on filters.
modality.base.backoffice.operations.generic
Defines some generic operations that a back-office user can execute on any entity (ex: copy to clipboard, set a field, toggle a boolean field).
modality.base.backoffice.operations.snapshot
Defines operations to create a snapshot of an entity.
modality.base.client.activity
Define some generic class materials to build Modality client activities.
modality.base.client.activity.organizationdependent
Define some class materials to build organization-dependent client activities.
modality.base.client.application
Define a generic Modality JavaFX application (common code to the back-office and front-office).
modality.base.client.busconfig
Module that defines the default client bus configuration (with configuration variables and default values).
modality.base.client.entities
Utility classes for working with entities on client side.
modality.base.client.gantt.canvas
A zoomable Gantt canvas that can displays years, months, weeks and days over a time window.
modality.base.client.gantt.fx
A set of Gantt-related JavaFX properties (time window, selection, visibility, etc...).
modality.base.client.i18n
The Modality implementation of i18n with English & French dictionaries.
modality.base.client.navigationarrows.java
Plugin module to declare the backward and forward navigation operations in Java.
modality.base.client.operationactionsloading
Module responsible for loading all information about operations from the database on client start.
modality.base.client.presentationmodel
Set of HasXXX JavaFX markers designed for building presentation models.
modality.base.client.time.theme
A theme for visual component representing time.
modality.base.client.util
A set of client-side utility classes (translate function & route interpolator).
modality.base.client.validation
Modality implementation of client validation support.
modality.base.frontoffice.activities.account
The front-office Account activity.
modality.base.frontoffice.activities.alerts
The front-office Alerts activity.
modality.base.frontoffice.utility
A set of utility classes for the front-office.
modality.base.server.datasource
Module that defines the database connection (configurable variables with default values), and test the connection on server start.
modality.base.shared.domainmodel
Module that loads the domain model in memory (on both client & server).
modality.base.shared.entities
Module that defines a set of Java wrappers for domain entities (easier to interact with Java code).
modality.catering.backoffice.activities.kitchen
The Kitchen activity that displays the meals figures for the selected month.
modality.crm.backoffice.bookingdetailspanel
The UI panel that displays all booking details, including the personal details.
modality.crm.backoffice.operations.mail
The UI operations for mails: opening a mail, and composing a new mail.
modality.crm.backoffice.organization.fx
A JavaFX property holder of the current Event viewed by the user in the back-office.
modality.crm.client.activities.login
The login activity displayed by the UI router to an unauthenticated user trying to access a route requiring authorization.
modality.crm.client.activities.unauthorized
The unauthorised activity displayed by the UI router to an authenticated user trying to access an unauthorised route.
modality.crm.client.authn.fx
A JavaFX property holder of an authenticated Modality user (ModalityUserPrincipal).
modality.crm.client.authz
Client-side module responsible for checking if the user is authorised to access a route or execute an operation.
modality.crm.client.personaldetails
The UI panel that displays the personal details of a booking.
modality.crm.server.authn.gateway
Server-side module responsible for checking username/password authentication requests.
modality.crm.server.authz
Server-side module responsible for pushing the user authorization data to the client just after a successful authentication.
modality.crm.shared.authn
Defines the authentication data (ModalityUserPrincipal) sent by the server to the client over the network.
modality.ecommerce.backoffice.activities.bookings
The bookings activity to view, search, and amend bookings.
modality.ecommerce.backoffice.activities.moneyflows
The money flows activity to define the Organization money accounts and the possible money flows between them.
modality.ecommerce.backoffice.activities.statistics
The statistics activity to view the number of booked options over the time.
modality.ecommerce.backoffice.operations.document
Defines the different operations that a back-office user can possibly execute on a booking itself.
modality.ecommerce.backoffice.operations.documentline
Defines the basic operations that a back-office user can possibly execute on an option booked within a booking.
modality.ecommerce.backoffice.operations.moneyflow
Defines the different operations that a back-office user can possibly execute on money flows.
modality.ecommerce.backoffice.operations.moneytransfer
Defines the different operations that a back-office user can possibly execute on money transfers.
modality.ecommerce.payment.custom
The logical starting point to initiate custom payments (this API can be called either on client or server).
modality.ecommerce.payment.custom.buscall
Declares the custom payment endpoint address, and implements the data serialisation.
modality.ecommerce.payment.custom.remote
The client-side implementation of the custom payment API (just forwards the request to the server).
modality.ecommerce.payment.custom.server
The actual server-side implementation of the custom payment API, which decides which payment gateway to use and calls it.
modality.ecommerce.payment.custom.ui
The UI displayed to the user for initiating a custom payment before calling the custom payment API.
modality.ecommerce.payment.delegated
The logical starting point to initiate delegated payments (this API can be called either on client or server).
modality.ecommerce.payment.delegated.buscall
Declares the delegated payment endpoint address, and implements the data serialisation.
modality.ecommerce.payment.delegated.remote
The client-side implementation of the delegated payment API (just forwards the request to the server).
modality.ecommerce.payment.delegated.server
The actual server-side implementation of the delegated payment API, which decides which payment gateway to use and calls it.
modality.ecommerce.payment.delegated.ui
The UI displayed to the user for initiating a delegated payment before calling the delegated payment API.
modality.ecommerce.payment.direct
The logical starting point to initiate direct payments (this API can be called either on client or server).
modality.ecommerce.payment.direct.buscall
Declares the direct payment endpoint address, and implements the data serialisation.
modality.ecommerce.payment.direct.remote
The client-side implementation of the direct payment API (just forwards the request to the server).
modality.ecommerce.payment.direct.server
The actual server-side implementation of the direct payment API, which decides which payment gateway to use and calls it.
modality.ecommerce.payment.direct.ui
The UI displayed to the user for initiating a direct payment before calling the direct payment API.
modality.ecommerce.payment.gateway.custom
The generic Server Provider Interface for custom payments to call a payment gateway.
modality.ecommerce.payment.gateway.custom.stripe
The SPI payment gateway implementation for making custom payments with Stripe.
modality.ecommerce.payment.gateway.delegated
The generic Server Provider Interface for delegated payments to call a payment gateway.
modality.ecommerce.payment.gateway.delegated.stripe
The SPI payment gateway implementation for making delegated payments with Stripe.
modality.ecommerce.payment.gateway.direct
The generic Server Provider Interface for custom payments to call a payment gateway.
modality.ecommerce.payment.gateway.direct.authorizedotnet
The SPI payment gateway implementation for making direct payments with Authorize.net.
modality.event.backoffice.event.fx
A JavaFX property holder of the current Event viewed by the user in the back-office.
modality.event.backoffice.events.ganttcanvas
The Gantt canvas that displays events over the current Gantt time window.
modality.event.backoffice.events.pm
A generic events-oriented presentation model that can be used by events-oriented back-office activities.
modality.event.client.activity.eventdependent
A generic event-dependent activity that can be extended.
modality.event.client.theme
Theme for visual components representing events.
modality.event.frontoffice.activities.booking
The front-office booking activity.
modality.hotel.backoffice.accommodation
A set of classes shared by the Accommodation & Household activities.
modality.hotel.backoffice.activities.accommodation
The back-office Accommodation activity.
modality.hotel.backoffice.activities.household
The back-office Household activity.
modality.hotel.backoffice.icons
Bed & room SVG icons.
modality.hotel.backoffice.operations.documentline
Defines an additional operation (mark bed as cleaned) that a back-office user can execute on an accommodation option.
modality.hotel.backoffice.operations.resourceconfiguration
Defines the basic operations that a back-office user can execute on a resource configuration (= room configuration here).
